summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the National Indian Cultural and Education Center in Discovery Park; amending Sections 1 and 2 of Ordinance 104794 and adding Section 2A thereto to reduce the amount of financial assistance authorized to be applied for in connection with said project and accepting the same; to permit the use of certain on-site materials as "in-kind" match for said financial assistance; and to authorize memorandums of understanding between the Superintendent of Parks and Recreation and United Indians of All Tribes Foundation to provide for efficient administration of said project.
